attributes.action: Dismiss the fact that CO2 emisions are responsible for global warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As you are aware, the Earth is heating. The government blames this on CO2 emission, however as you may also be aware, the Earth goes through a natural cycle of heating and cooling. The Earth cools and there begins an iceage, the Earth then heats up and then again cools down. The earth is simply going through a period of heating. The blaming of this heating on CO2 emisions are just a way of saving oil!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
